channel.title: Can someone please tell me this?
channel.description:
is there a command that for example ::reset that puts system update in 0.10 in bottom right of screen?
if there is can you post here?
thanks

item.title: Can someone please tell me this?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

thats ::update.

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt( command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone please tell me this?
